# The `GVNSink.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass attempts to sink instructions into successors, reducing static instruction count and enabling if-conversion. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass attempts to sink instructions into successors, reducing static instruction count and enabling if-conversion.

We use a variant of global value numbering to decide what can be sunk. Consider:

&#91; a1 = add i32 b, 1 &#93; &#91; c1 = add i32 d, 1 &#93; &#91; a2 = xor i32 a1, 1 &#93; &#91; c2 = xor i32 c1, 1 &#93; \\ / &#91; e = phi i32 a2, c2 &#93; &#91; add i32 e, 4 &#93;

GVN would number a1 and c1 differently because they compute different results - the VN of an instruction is a function of its opcode and the transitive closure of its operands. This is the key property for hoisting and CSE.

What we want when sinking however is for a numbering that is a function of the <em>uses</em> of an instruction, which allows us to answer the question &quot;if I
replace %a1 with %c1, will it contribute in an equivalent way to all
successive instructions?&quot;. The PostValueTable class in GVN provides this mapping.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Iterates through instructions in a set of blocks in reverse order from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// first non-terminator. For example (assume all blocks have size n):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">///   LockstepReverseIterator I(&#91;B1, B2, B3&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42;I-- = &#91;B1&#91;n&#93;, B2&#91;n&#93;, B3&#91;n&#93;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42;I-- = &#91;B1&#91;n-1&#93;, B2&#91;n-1&#93;, B3&#91;n-1&#93;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42;I-- = &#91;B1&#91;n-2&#93;, B2&#91;n-2&#93;, B3&#91;n-2&#93;&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It continues until all blocks have been exhausted. Use \\c getActiveBlocks()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">/// determine which blocks are still going and the order they appear in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// list returned by operator&#42;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#ada212da7b23e40b5ad408fac227acbf6">LockstepReverseIterator</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Blocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> ActiveBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Insts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Fail;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#ada212da7b23e40b5ad408fac227acbf6"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#ada212da7b23e40b5ad408fac227acbf6">LockstepReverseIterator</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Blocks) : Blocks(Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a4cca242a1079a1e7e8a288584a11b8f4">reset</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a4cca242a1079a1e7e8a288584a11b8f4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a4cca242a1079a1e7e8a288584a11b8f4">reset</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    Fail = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    ActiveBlocks.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : Blocks)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      ActiveBlocks.insert(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    Insts.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB : Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB-&gt;size() &lt;= 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Block wasn&#39;t big enough - only contained a terminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">        ActiveBlocks.remove(BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">      Insts.push&#95;back(BB-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getPrevNonDebugInstruction());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Insts.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">      Fail = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a0517c4e0ca82094edc64de1796969ebe"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a0517c4e0ca82094edc64de1796969ebe">isValid</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> !Fail; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a6d39273b9aacc4fe586b928297a84fcd"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a6d39273b9aacc4fe586b928297a84fcd">operator&#42;</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Insts; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: This needs to return a SmallSetVector as the elements of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ActiveBlocks will be later copied to Blocks using std::copy. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resultant order of elements in Blocks needs to be deterministic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Using SmallPtrSet instead causes non-deterministic order while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// copying. And we cannot simply sort Blocks as they need to match the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// corresponding Values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a1c19d8d16ee457dda6fed85074c4b02a"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a1c19d8d16ee457dda6fed85074c4b02a">getActiveBlocks</a>() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ActiveBlocks; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a17419dbf59adef35ccdbb5f6afc88c42"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#a17419dbf59adef35ccdbb5f6afc88c42">restrictToBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> &amp;Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = Insts.begin(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> != Insts.end();) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Blocks.contains((&#42;II)-&gt;getParent())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">        ActiveBlocks.remove((&#42;II)-&gt;getParent());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = Insts.erase(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#add4e11e58e765474930767db18feb623"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/lockstepreverseiterator/#add4e11e58e765474930767db18feb623">operator--</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Fail)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewInsts;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Inst : Insts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Inst == &amp;Inst-&gt;getParent()-&gt;front())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Inst-&gt;getPrevNonDebugInstruction());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewInsts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      Fail = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Candidate solution for sinking. There may be different ways to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sink instructions, differing in the number of instructions sunk,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the number of predecessors sunk from and the number of PHIs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">/// required.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate">SinkingInstructionCandidate</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a4515af85001cf740c714f2814fb24fe6"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a4515af85001cf740c714f2814fb24fe6">NumBlocks</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a9884cebe606608bbdd9df07e3052eee9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a9884cebe606608bbdd9df07e3052eee9">NumInstructions</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a256402af6ff648942bfedcaa3823cb9c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a256402af6ff648942bfedcaa3823cb9c">NumPHIs</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a65e336b73cb430195ef19cb972dda133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a65e336b73cb430195ef19cb972dda133">NumMemoryInsts</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a6d33b057043a5ee66078eb8fa99e468a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a6d33b057043a5ee66078eb8fa99e468a">Cost</a> = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#aefe358834e7bf9c12a65d27deb86fb53"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#aefe358834e7bf9c12a65d27deb86fb53">Blocks</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#aa63fac90d0337411599be1ed628355f7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#aa63fac90d0337411599be1ed628355f7">calculateCost</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumOrigPHIs, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumOrigBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumExtraPHIs = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a256402af6ff648942bfedcaa3823cb9c">NumPHIs</a> - NumOrigPHIs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitEdgeCost = (NumOrigBlocks &gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a4515af85001cf740c714f2814fb24fe6">NumBlocks</a>) ? 2 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a6d33b057043a5ee66078eb8fa99e468a">Cost</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a9884cebe606608bbdd9df07e3052eee9">NumInstructions</a> &#42; (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/sinkinginstructioncandidate/#a4515af85001cf740c714f2814fb24fe6">NumBlocks</a> - 1)) -</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">           (NumExtraPHIs &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">            NumExtraPHIs) </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHIs are expensive, so make sure they&#39;re worth it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">           - SplitEdgeCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/modelledphi/#a737711cb6f02ce642903b3fe73864645"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/modelledphi/#a737711cb6f02ce642903b3fe73864645">verifyModelledPHI</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const BasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;BlockOrder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a value number table where the value number is a function of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42;uses&#42; of a value, rather than its operands. Thus, if VN(A) == VN(B) we know</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the program would be equivalent if we replaced A with PHI(A, B).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Helper to compute the value number for a memory instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Removes all value numberings and resets the value table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/valuetable/#acfdef247a5c87f5c377d10db4983ce85"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gvnsink-cpp-/valuetable/#acfdef247a5c87f5c377d10db4983ce85">clear</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">    ValueNumbering.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">    ExpressionNumbering.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    HashNumbering.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">    Recycler.clear(Allocator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">    nextValueNumber = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\c Inst uses or touches memory. Return an ID describing the memory state</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// at \\c Inst such that if getMemoryUseOrder(I1) == getMemoryUseOrder(I2),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the exact same memory operations happen after I1 and I2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is a very hard problem in general, so we use domain-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// knowledge that we only ever check for equivalence between blocks sharing a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// single immediate successor that is common, and when determining if I1 ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// I2 we will have already determined that next(I1) == next(I2). This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// inductive property allows us to simply return the value number of the next</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction that defines memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
